p: The second largest non-B cluster contained 1640 CRF07_BC sequences including 3 NCC sequences, 727 LANL sequences directly linked to 1 of these 3 NCC sequences, and 910 additional LANL sequences. Most (1619) of these sequences were from China ( Table 2). The recent origin of this cluster (1990; HPD, 1984â€“1995) is consistent with previous descriptions of this subtype as a rapidly growing population [ 28]. There is no evidence for ongoing transmission of these viruses in the NCC ( Supplementary Figure 5).
